Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring annual financial disclosure from each person who has any interest in a taxicab license.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring annual financial disclosure from each person who has any interest in a taxicab license.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the taxi and limousine commission to evaluate the character and integrity of taxicab brokers, agents, and taxicab licensees
